plugins.name: 图像矢量化 Image Tracer
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to convert raster images into scalable vector graphics with a single click. Enhance your design process by transforming pixel-based images into smooth, resolution-independent vectors directly within Figma.


Function Description

  1. Vectorizes selected image nodes into SVG format.
  2. Preserves image structure and generates editable vector paths.
  3. Outputs scalable vector graphics compatible with Figma’s design tools.


How to Use

  1. Select an image node on your Figma canvas.
  2. Click the “Vectorize Image” button in the plugin UI.
  3. The plugin will generate an SVG vector output placed adjacent to the original image node.


Notes

  1. Ensure only one image node is selected before using the plugin.
  2. Only image nodes are supported for vectorization. Non-image nodes will not be processed.
  3. Large images may take additional time for processing.


介绍

此 Figma 插件支持一键将光栅图像转换为可缩放的矢量图形，让您在 Figma 内直接将像素图转换为平滑的、分辨率无关的矢量图，从而提升设计流程。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的图像节点矢量化为 SVG 格式。
  2. 保留图像结构，生成可编辑的矢量路径。
  3. 输出的矢量图与 Figma 的设计工具兼容。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 画布上选择一个图像节点。
  2. 点击插件界面的“矢量化图像”按钮。
  3. 插件将在原始图像节点旁生成一个 SVG 矢量输出。


注意事项

  1. 请确保使用插件前只选中了一个图像节点。
  2. 仅支持对图像节点进行矢量化，非图像节点将无法处理。
  3. 对于较大的图像，处理时间可能会稍长。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Convert Images to Vectors Seamlessly

plugins.name: 一键翻译元素 Quick Translate
plugins.description:
Introduction

Quick Translate is a Figma plugin designed to help you instantly translate selected text elements into different languages with just one click. Save time and improve your workflow by translating text directly within your design files.


Function Description

  1. Translate selected text elements into a specified target language.
  2. Supports multiple languages and automatic translation of all text layers in a Figma selection.
  3. Easy-to-use interface to select languages and apply translations quickly.
  4. Ideal for designers working on multilingual projects or collaborating with global teams.


How to Use

  1. Select one or more text elements in your Figma file.
  2. Open the plugin from the "Plugins" menu.
  3. Choose the target language for translation.
  4. Click the "Translate" button, and the selected text will be replaced with the translated version.


Notes

  1. Ensure your Figma selection includes text elements, as the plugin only works with text layers.
  2. The translation may vary depending on the accuracy of the API and the language selected.
  3. For optimal results, select only relevant text elements to avoid unnecessary API calls.


介绍

Quick Translate 是一款 Figma 插件，旨在帮助您一键翻译选中的文本元素。通过该插件，您可以直接在 Figma 文件中将文本翻译为不同语言，节省时间，提高工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文本元素翻译为指定的目标语言。
  2. 支持多种语言，并自动翻译 Figma 选择中的所有文本图层。
  3. 提供简单易用的界面，可以快速选择语言并应用翻译。
  4. 适用于多语言项目的设计师，或者与全球团队协作的设计师。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个文本元素。
  2. 从“插件”菜单打开插件。
  3. 选择目标翻译语言。
  4. 点击“翻译”按钮，选中的文本将被翻译并替换。


注意事项

  1. 请确保您的 Figma 选择包含文本元素，因为插件只支持文本图层。
  2. 翻译效果可能会根据 API 的准确性和所选语言有所不同。
  3. 为了获得最佳效果，建议只选择相关的文本元素，以避免不必要的 API 请求。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quick Translate: Instant Translation for Figma Elements

plugins.name: 画板json导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin is designed to help users export detailed JSON data of selected nodes, including auto layout information, Frame nesting relationships, text properties, and more. With this plugin, users can easily retrieve structured data from design elements, facilitating data analysis, secondary development, or documentation.


功能

  1. Export complete JSON data of selected nodes, including properties like type, name, size, position, fills, strokes, and more.
  2. Support exporting text content, font name, font size, and other properties of text nodes.
  3. Support nested export of nodes such as Frame, Group, Component, and Instance, preserving the full hierarchical structure.
  4. Complete export of auto layout information, including layout mode, primary and secondary axis alignment, padding, and spacing.
  5. Safely serialized JSON data export ensures compatibility and completeness.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select one or more nodes from which you want to export data.
  2. Click the export button in the plugin, and the plugin will automatically extract all relevant information from the selected nodes and generate JSON data.
  3. The exported JSON data will be displayed in the plugin interface, allowing users to copy or download it for further use.


Notes

  1. This plugin currently supports exporting properties of common node types such as Frame.
  2. Ensure that the selected node types are supported by the plugin; otherwise, related data might not be exportable.
  3. If errors occur during the export process, check whether the nodes contain excessive nesting or complex properties. Simplify the structure if needed and try again.


简介

本插件旨在帮助用户导出选定节点的详细 JSON 数据，包括节点的自动布局信息、Frame 嵌套关系、文本属性等。通过此插件，用户可以轻松地获取设计元素的结构化数据，便于进行数据分析、二次开发或文档记录。


功能

  1. 导出选定节点的完整 JSON 数据，包括节点的类型、名称、尺寸、位置、填充、边框等属性。
  2. 支持导出文本节点的文本内容、字体名称、字号等属性。
  3. 支持 Frame、Group、Component、Instance 等节点类型的嵌套导出，保留完整的层次结构。
  4. 自动布局信息的完整导出，包括布局模式、主次轴对齐方式、填充和间距等。
  5. 导出的 JSON 数据经过安全序列化，确保兼容性和完整性。


使用说明

  1. 选中一个或多个需要导出数据的节点。
  2. 在插件中点击导出按钮，插件将自动提取选定节点的所有相关信息并生成 JSON 数据。
  3. 导出的 JSON 数据将会显示在插件界面中，用户可以复制或下载该数据用于其他用途。


注意事项

  1. 本插件目前只支持导出 Frame节点类型的属性。
  2. 请确保选定的节点类型受插件支持，否则可能无法导出相关数据。
  3. 如果导出过程中出现错误，请检查节点是否包含过多层次的嵌套或复杂的属性，建议简化结构后再试。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: The plugin quickly exports selected frame JSON data from Figma for other uses.

plugins.name: Page Navigator
plugins.description:
Overview

Page Navigator is a tool that helps you organize and navigate through complex Figma documents. It provides both page management features and the ability to create beautiful navigation indexes that make it easy for users to jump between pages.


Key Features

Navigation Index Generation

- Create comprehensive page indexes with clickable navigation links

- Smart positioning: places index at document start or after cover page

- Professional table layout with clean typography and alternating row colors

- Updates existing indexes instead of creating duplicates

- Intelligent page classification with automatic numbering

- Real-time navigation to any page with direct links


Smart Page Management

- Add, rename, duplicate, and delete pages

- Drag & drop reordering

- Bulk operations with multi-select

- Real-time search and filtering


How to Use

Creating a Navigation Index

1. **Open the Plugin**: Launch "Page Navigator" from the Figma plugins menu

2. **Click "Create Navigation Index"**: This generates a new page with a comprehensive index

3. **Navigate**: Click any "🔗 Go to Page" link in the generated index to jump directly to that page


Section Organizers (Not Linked)

- Pages starting with folder icon 📂 or down arrow ↓

- Behavior: Listed in index but not numbered and no clickable links

- Purpose: Used for visual organization and section breaks


Special Pages (Linked but Not Numbered)

- Pages named: cover, changelog, contents, design language, resource links (case insensitive)

- Also includes variations: Cover Page, CHANGELOG, Table of Contents, Design System, etc.

- Example: Cover, COVER PAGE, Changelog, Contents, Design Language

- Behavior: Listed with clickable links but not numbered

- Purpose: Important pages that don't need sequential numbering


Hidden Pages (Linked but Not Numbered)

- Pages starting with . (period)

- Example: .template, .archive, .backup

- Behavior: Listed with clickable links but not numbered

- Purpose: Utility pages that should be accessible but not prominent


Regular Content Pages (Numbered and Linked)

- All other pages

- Example: Homepage, Product Details, User Dashboard

- Behavior: Numbered sequentially (1, 2, 3...) with clickable links

- Purpose: Main content pages in your design system


Automatically Excluded

- Divider pages: Pages with names consisting only of dashes (-, --, ---, ——, –, etc.)

- The navigation index itself: Prevents self-referencing


Managing Pages

Adding Pages

1. Enter a page name in the input field

2. Click "Add Page" or press Enter

3. The new page is created and you're automatically switched to it


Renaming Pages

1. Click the "Rename" button next to any page

2. Edit the name inline

3. Press Enter to save or Escape to cancel


Reordering Pages

1. Use the drag handle next to any page name

2. Drag to the desired position

3. Pages are reordered in real-time


Deleting Pages

1. Select pages using checkboxes

2. Click "Delete Selected"

3. Confirm deletion (at least one page must remain)


Tips for Best Results

Naming Conventions

- Use Folder Section Name for major sections

- Use Down Arrow Subsection for subsections

- Name key pages cover, contents, etc. for special treatment

- Use .utility-name for templates and archives


Index Placement

- The index page is automatically placed at the beginning of your document

- If you have a page named "cover", the index is placed right after it

- This ensures logical document flow for viewers


Updating Indexes

- Re-run "Create Navigation Index" to update existing indexes

- The plugin detects existing indexes and updates them instead of creating duplicates

- Perfect for keeping navigation current as your document evolves


- Click "Add Page" to create a new page

- Enter the page name in the modern modal dialog

- The new page will be created and automatically selected

- Press Enter to create or Escape to cancel

- No more browser popup blocking issues


Duplicate Pages

- Click the duplicate button next to any page

- Creates an exact copy with " Copy" appended to the name

- Works with all page types including divider pages


Smart Page Features

- Divider Pages: Pages with only dashes (---, ——, –, etc.) are displayed as "Divider" but retain their original functionality

- Current Page Protection: The currently active page is highlighted and cannot be deleted but can be renamed, duplicated, and reordered

- Auto-Update: UI automatically updates when you switch pages in Figma

- Bulk Operations: Select multiple pages for efficient batch operations
plugins.tagline: Manage document pages and create navigation indexes with direct clickable links.

Duplicate Pages

- Click the duplicate button next to any page

- Creates an exact copy with " Copy" appended to the name

- Works with all page types including divider pages


Smart Page Features

- Divider Pages: Pages with only dashes (---, ——, –, etc.) are displayed as "Divider" but retain their original functionality

- Current Page Protection: The currently active page is highlighted and cannot be deleted but can be renamed, duplicated, and reordered

- Auto-Update: UI automatically updates when you switch pages in Figma

- Bulk Operations: Select multiple pages for efficient batch operations
140669.tagline: Manage document pages and create navigation indexes with direct clickable links.

plugins.name: Controlled Chaos Generator
plugins.description:
Controlled Chaos is a creative plugin for Figma that lets you generate multiple layout variations from a single frame using randomized component variants and layout rules.


Ideal for generative design workflows, creative exploration, and visual prototyping, the plugin allows you to:


Randomize Variants and Modes within a component set


Generate layout variations based on predefined rules


Choose your level of chaos, from subtle to extreme


Preserve your original design by generating new instances


Whether you're designing posters, exploring compositions, or creating a system for generative art, Controlled Chaos gives you the power to balance consistency with surprise.


How to use it

Select a frame that contains components with variants (e.g. posters, cards, layouts…).


In the plugin UI, choose your Chaos Level:

Low: subtle and controlled changes

Medium: a balance between order and randomness

High: full chaos, maximum variation


(Optional) Enable Layout Chaos to also randomize the size and layout properties of elements.


Click “Generate chaos”. The plugin will create a duplicate of your selected frame, with randomized variants and layout — your original design stays untouched.
plugins.tagline: Variants & layout randomizer

plugins.name: TypoFix – Font Consistency Checker
plugins.description:
✅ TypoFix – Font Consistency Checker

Catch font mistakes before they catch your users.


TypoFix is a powerful yet simple Figma plugin that scans your selected text layers and instantly detects inconsistencies in:


✅ Font family


✅ Font size


✅ Font style (e.g., Bold, Italic)


✅ Fill color


✅ Missing fonts


✅ Unlinked or detached text styles


Whether you're a solo designer or part of a team, TypoFix ensures your typography stays polished, consistent, and ready for production.


🚀 How it works:

Select the frames or text layers you want to audit.


Click “Scan Fonts” – TypoFix uses your first selected text as a reference.


Instantly see all mismatched layers, clearly highlighted with ❌ and ✅ marks.


Export a CSV report for review, sharing, or documentation.


✨ Why use TypoFix?

No setup, no learning curve – just plug and scan.


Lightweight and fast – no internet/API needed.


Helps enforce design systems and style guides.


Perfect for handoff-ready designs or quick audits.


🔍 Pro Tip: Use TypoFix before design reviews or developer handoffs to eliminate common typography errors and maintain consistency across your design files.
plugins.tagline: Catch Font Flaws Before Users Do.

plugins.name: Not a Linker
plugins.description:
[Ru]

Not a Linker — это умный плагин для быстрого копирования ссылок на фреймы и секции в Figma с поддержкой кликабельных ссылок.


🎯 КЛЮЧЕВЫЕ ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ:

  1. Умное копирование — HTML + обычный текст для максимальной совместимости
  2. Кликабельные ссылки — работают в Telegram, Slack и других приложениях
  3. 9 языков — автоматическое определение языка браузера
  4. Мгновенная работа — выбрал фреймы → один клик → готово
  5. Универсальность — работает с фреймами и секциями
  6. Компактный интерфейс — не отвлекает от работы


🚀 КАК РАБОТАЕТ:

  1. Выберите фреймы или секции
  2. Запустите плагин → "Copy and Close"
  3. Вставляйте кликабельные ссылки где угодно

📱 СОВМЕСТИМОСТЬ: Telegram, Slack, Notes, Word, Notion, Confluence и любые текстовые редакторы


Идеально для дизайнеров, которые часто делятся ссылками на конкретные фреймы. Экономьте время и работайте эффективнее!

Not a Linker is a smart plugin for quickly copying frame and section links in Figma with clickable link support.

  1. Smart copying — HTML + plain text for maximum compatibility
  2. Clickable links — work in Telegram, Slack, and other apps
  3. 9 languages — automatic browser language detection
  4. Instant workflow — select frames → one click → done
  5. Universal — works with both frames and sections
  6. Compact interface — doesn't distract from your work

  1. Select frames or sections

plugins.name: TextFiller
plugins.description:
TextFiller helps you update multiple text layers with just one click. Perfect for designers working with text-heavy interfaces, landing pages, or any project with repetitive content updates.


✨ Key Features:

  1. Bulk update multiple text layers in one click
  2. Preserves all text formatting (fonts, sizes, colors, spacing)
  3. Smart name-based matching - no more manual copy-paste
  4. Clear feedback on applied changes
  5. Simple format: just paste "texto1: Your content here"


📝 How it works:

#1 - Name your text layers as "texto1", "texto2", "texto3"...

#2 - Paste your content in the plugin using the format:

texto1: Your headline here

texto2: Your description here

texto3: Call to action text

#3 - Click apply and watch the magic happen!


Perfect for:

  1. Landing pages with multiple text variations
  2. A/B testing different copy
  3. Localizing designs to multiple languages
  4. Updating placeholder text with real content
  5. Design systems with text templates


Save hours of repetitive work. Let TextFiller handle the boring stuff while you focus on design.
plugins.tagline: Apply multiple texts with one click while preserving styles

plugins.name: ContentKit
plugins.description:
Design and prototype more efficiently with ContentKit

Use ContentKit as your central hub for all design content. Generate any kind of data with AI and sync your designs directly in Figma with one click. Collaborate seamlessly with your team like never before.


Try it in the playground file: https://www.figma.com/community/file/1500498135891868616


🤖 Generate content with AI: Bootstrap your prototypes with AI-generated datasets. Create realistic content for any scenario without having to start from scratch.


🎛️ Populate anything, not just text: Populate text, variant properties, component instances, and colors to update entire prototypes.


✏️ Create and edit directly in Figma: Build custom scenarios and edit data without leaving Figma. Define real-life situations and personas, then populate each screen exactly how you want it. No import roundtrips, no confusion about who has the latest data.


🔄 Keep your prototypes synced: Large prototypes often mean duplicated screens. Sync changes across all screens at once, so you never miss updating that one text box in the corner.


📁 Stay organized with projects: Sort your content using projects and screens.


👥 Collaborate with team and clients: Share datasets with your team and clients so they can contribute content while you design. Apply their changes with one click when ready.


🚀 Why ContentKit?

ContentKit provides better workflows, more seamless editing, and applies content more reliably than other tools. Variant properties, nested data and complex screens are no afterthought.


The ability to create and populate multiple columns allows working with detailed data and is perfectly suited for prototypes that need to be kept up to date across iterations.


📊 Additional Features

- Works seamlessly with nested screens and complex designs

- Import your existing data from CSV and Excel

- Built-in permissions and security controls


Learn more: intersectionslab.com/contentkit


Have feedback or ideas?

Contact me at kmueller@intersectionslab.com
plugins.tagline: Generate data with AI and populate text, properties, instances, and more…

plugins.name: Annotate Flow
plugins.description:
Annotate Flow allows you to quickly and conveniently add numbered markers and text comments to any objects in Figma. Ideal for:

  1. conducting reviews,
  2. creating guides,
  3. visually explaining interface elements.


Functionality:

  1. A numbered marker and outline (if enabled) automatically appear next to the selected object.
  2. Comments are placed separately outside the frame and do not fall inside the interface layers.
  3. Ability to choose the background and text color for annotations.
  4. Ability to choose the font size for comment text.
  5. Ability to lock the frames of the created design (except for the plugin elements themselves) with one click.
  6. “Delete Annotation” button for easy deletion of one or more comments at the same time, even in the middle of numbering. This way, the numbering shifts and does not break.
  7. Convenient and intuitive interface.


🧩 Works with any layers and components. No configuration required — just select an object and click “ADD ANNOTATION”.
plugins.tagline: Instantly create numbered markers and comments with color settings to annotate, explain any design.

140596.name: Annotate Flow
140596.description:
Annotate Flow allows you to quickly and conveniently add numbered markers and text comments to any objects in Figma. Ideal for:

  1. conducting reviews,
  2. creating guides,
  3. visually explaining interface elements.


Functionality:

  1. A numbered marker and outline (if enabled) automatically appear next to the selected object.
  2. Comments are placed separately outside the frame and do not fall inside the interface layers.
  3. Ability to choose the background and text color for annotations.
  4. Ability to choose the font size for comment text.
  5. Ability to lock the frames of the created design (except for the plugin elements themselves) with one click.
  6. “Delete Annotation” button for easy deletion of one or more comments at the same time, even in the middle of numbering. This way, the numbering shifts and does not break.
  7. Convenient and intuitive interface.


🧩 Works with any layers and components. No configuration required — just select an object and click “ADD ANNOTATION”.
140596.release_notes:
🗑️ Multi-Select Deletion
Select multiple comment instances on the canvas and remove them all at once instead of one by one.

🔢 Automatic Re-Indexing
After deletion, remaining comments are renumbered so their indices run consecutively without gaps.

🎨 Synchronized Marker & Outline Updates
Each comment is linked to a marker (numbered shape) and an outline. Deletions remove all related nodes, and surviving markers/outlines are renamed and renumbered automatically.

⚡ Robust & Responsive

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.description:
Supply a primary color and the plugin will generate accessible light and dark themed ui color palettes. Each palette includes:


Palette

  1. Primary
  2. Secondary (primary analogous, complementary, split compliment left, or split compliment right)
  3. Success
  4. Warn
  5. Error
  6. Info


Background

  1. z0
  2. z1
  3. z2
  4. z3
  5. z4
  6. z5


Palette hover

  1. Primary
  2. Secondary
  3. Success
  4. Warn
  5. Error
  6. Info


Text

  1. base (either #000 or #fff)
  2. light (base @ 75% opacity)
  3. lighter (base @ 50% opacity)
  4. lightest (base @ 33% opacity)


Text on palette

  1. textBaseOnPrimary
  2. textLightOnPrimary
  3. textLighterOnPrimary
  4. textLightestOnPrimary
  5. etc


Clicking "Add to document" will add both the light and dark themes as variable modes. If you're using the free plan, only the selected theme is added.


The plugin UI provides a live preview of the generated palettes in use.

plugins.name: Lazer
plugins.description:
Lazer is a plugin for Figma that provides quick commands to adjust the layout and appearance properties of selected elements. It is somewhat opinionated.


The idea is to leave the keyboard less by creating pseudo shortcuts. By bringing up the Actions input with command + K or command + / and then typing a short code (eg. w.h), the fuzzy search will bring your focus to an action you can execute by pressing enter.


I used Gemini 2.5 Pro to build this.


Features

This plugin allows you to quickly adjust:


Width & Height

w.h - Set Width to Hug

h.h - Set Height to Hug

w.f - Set Width to Fill

h.f - Set Height to Fill

w.. - Set Width (prompts for custom value)

h.. - Set Height (prompts for custom value)


Padding

p.0 - Set All Padding to 0

p.16 - Set All Padding to 16

p.. - Set Padding (prompts for custom value)


Auto Layout

al.. - Set Auto Layout Alignment (opens alignment UI)

al.h - Set Auto Layout to Horizontal

al.v - Set Auto Layout to Vertical

g.0 - Set Gap to 0

g.8 - Set Gap to 8

g.16 - Set Gap to 16

g.. - Set Gap (prompts for custom value)


Border Radius

br.0 - Set Border Radius to 0px

br.8 - Set Border Radius to 8px

br.. - Set Border Radius (prompts for custom value)


Stroke

s.0 - Set Stroke Width to 0

s.1 - Set Stroke Width to 1

sw.. - Set Stroke Width (prompts for custom value)

sc.. - Set Stroke Colour (prompts for custom value)


Fill

f.1 - Add White Fill

f.0 - Remove All Fills

f.. - Set Fill Colour (prompts for custom value)


Text

ls.. - Set Text Letter Spacing (prompts for custom value)

t.s - Set Text Size (prompts for custom value)


General

help! - Show Commands and Shortcuts (displays this list in a popup)


Usage

  1. Open the Actions input with command + K or command + /
  2. Type the short code for the command (eg. w.h)
  3. Press enter (assuming you have your desired command in focus)


* Many commands apply adjustments directly (e.g., w.h - Set Width to Hug).

* The al.. - Set Auto Layout Alignment command will open a dialog for visual alignment selection.

* Commands ending with .. (e.g., p.. - Set Padding) will prompt you to enter a custom value.
plugins.tagline: Shortcuts as quick actions to help you Figma faster

plugins.name: Nativ Localization
plugins.description: The Nativ Localization plugin allows you to adapt visual content inside Figma to any culture and language (from any culture or language). This includes context-aware translation of editable text inside visual assets, as well as uneditable text that are part of complex pixel arts. The plugin allows you to upload your own glossary enabling you to control translation styles/tones. The translations automatically maintain the same original style in the target culture/language. The plugin also goes beyond text, such as stylistically replacing country flags in a poster based on the localization target.
plugins.tagline: Transform visual assets to any culture and language.
